content: zesty citrus coasters these coasters are made by sewing two crochet circles together back to back this makes them thick and absorbent and gives them their neat and finished appearance tools material and gauge i recommend cotton yarn for its absorbency and durability precise gauge does not matter for this project i used fingering cotton and a 3 mm hook and the resulting sizes are listed below if you want to use a heavier weight the coasters will turn out a little larger only a few yards are needed for one coaster the largest one weighs 14 g / 0 5 oz and requires about 50 yards total a tapestry needle is needed for sewing and embroidery sizes s m l size s lemons and limes 3 0 diameter size m oranges 3 5 diameter size l grapefruit 4 5 diameter stitch abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet esc extended single_crochet* double_crochet double_crochet *insert hook into stitch yarn over and pull loop = two loops on hook now yarn over and pull through first loop on hook only yarn over again and pull through both loops copyright susanne vetterkind you may spread the fun by sharing the pattern and you may make as many zesty citrus coasters as you like but please for personal use only enjoy zesty citrus coasters instructions round 1 make magic_ring chain 3 = 1st double_crochet *chain 1 2 double_crochet in ring repeat from * 4 more times end round with 1 double_crochet into ring and slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet > 12 double_crochet 6 spaces don t break yarn - pull the active loop open pass the ball of yarn through and pull the loop tight to secure the yarn round 2 attach fruit color at one of the chain spaces of the previous round chain 3 = 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in same space * 3 double_crochet in next chain-space repeat from * 4 more times end round with 1 double_crochet in same space as first two double_crochet close round with slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet > 18 double_crochet round 3 ch3 =1st double_crochet 2 double_crochet in each of the remaining stitches end round with one double_crochet in same stitch as 1st double_crochet close round with slip_stitch > 36 double_crochet size s only pull the active loop open pass the ball of yarn through and pull the loop tight to secure the yarn skip rounds 4 and 5 and continue with round 6 round 4 sizes m and l only ch3 =1st double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in one stitch 2 double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * 16 more times until 1 stitch is left end round with 1 double_crochet in last stitch 1 double_crochet in same stitch as first double_crochet close round with slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet > 54 double_crochet size m only pull the active loop open pass the ball of yarn through and pull the loop tight to secure the yarn skip round 5 and continue with round 6 round 5 size l only
